name: recphyloxml-visu-reconciliation
description: recphyloXML visualisation genes trees in species tree.

scripts.build: cat js/src/recTree.js js/src/process/parseRecPhyloXML.js js/src/process/flatGenesTrees.js js/src/process/reconcileTrees.js js/src/process/processRecTree.js js/src/map/mapRecTree.js js/src/render/renderRecTree.js > js/build/recTreeVisu.js

author: gouayave <guillaume.gence@gmail.com>
